text: Yvonne Li (born 30 May 1998) is a German badminton player. She won bronze medal at the 2015 European Junior Championships in the girls' doubles event. Li who affiliate with SC Union 08 Lüdinghausen was the National Champions in the women's singles in 2019 and 2020, also in the women's doubles in 2020. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships === Girls' singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" !
